attributes.action: Ring fence £350M p/w as promised for the NHS or hold another vote on the EU.
attributes.additional_details:
http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-36624697

Interview with prominent "Brexit" politician immediately denying the guaranteed funds for the NHS.
attributes.background:
A central promise of the "Leave" campaign was that £350M being spent on Europe each week would be used for the NHS instead. 

Voters made decisions on this claim and if it's not implemented a new vote should take place.
